content: everyday play for 18 or 19 doll note changes for the slimmer 19 dolls are in parentheses otherwise both sizes are worked the same yarn fingering-weight/four-ply yarn 50 g ball self-striping or plain needles 2 75 mm/us 2 needles 2 5 mm/us 1 1/2 needles gauge 28 sts 36 row = 4 /10 cm 32 sts 40 row = 4 /10 cm notions three 3/8 buttons 4 stitch markers note self-striping yarn works better when the dress is knitted in the round it doesn t show much at the placket but below the placket the stripes won t necessarily match up by switching to working in the round right after the placket there is no noticeable jog in the stripes this could be knit flat with a plain or less-obvious stripe or the stripes could be made with two different yarns and then sewn up the back i ve included directions for both in-the-round and flat working in the round requires alternating between k and p rounds to get the garter st borders if knitting flat the sleeve has to be worked before the body is joined co 60 sts and work 3 row garter st next row k to last 3 sts k2tog yo k1 buttonhole made row numbers start after this row even numbered row/rounds are rs row/rounds both in-the-round and flat versions are included instructions are the same for both versions except where specified row 1 k3 p to last 3 sts k3 60 sts row 2 k10 kfb place marker pm kfb k7 kfb pm kfb k18 kfb pm kfb k7 kfb pm kfb k10 68 sts row 3 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 68 sts row 4 knit across row increasing before and after each marker total 76 sts each section now has 13 13 24 13 13 sts from now on rs row will be all knit with increases before and after each marker the number of sts between markers is listed for each rs row row 5 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 76 sts row 6 14 15 26 15 14 sts 84 row 7 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 84 row 8 15 17 28 17 15 92 row 9 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 92 row 10 16 19 30 19 16 100 row 11 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 100 row 12 17 21 32 21 17 108 row 13 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 108 row 14 buttonhole row 18 23 34 23 18 116 end row with k2tog yo k1 row 15 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 116 row 16 19 25 36 25 19 124 row 17 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 124 row 18 20 27 38 27 20 132 row 19 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers k3 132 row 20
